# Simple Function Specification Template (Beginner)

Function
- Name and signature

Purpose
- 1–2 sentences describing what the function does and why it exists

Context
- Key background information
- Relevant system constraints

Inputs
- Parameter: Type — Description and constraints

Expected Output
- Return type — Description

Behaviour
- 2–3 sentences describing processing logic

Edge Cases and Constraints
- Case: Expected behaviour
- Case: Expected behaviour
- Case: Expected behaviour

Few-Shot Examples
- Input → Output
- Input → Output
- Input → Output

Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Testable criterion
- [ ] Testable criterion
- [ ] Testable criterion

Non-Functional Requirements
- Performance, security, maintainability notes if applicable
